instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2849: What is 820-2849? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U7000: What is U7000? U7000 refers to the ISL6258 or ISL6259 charging IC on Macbooks from 2008-2012.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.PP3V42_G3H: What is PP3V42_G3H? PP3V42_G3H is a power rail present when the machine is in a G3H global system hardware off state and is the first rail that should be generated in Macbooks that use it. .
definitions.PPDCIN_G3H: What is PPDCIN_G3H? PPDCIN_G3H Is a power rail that comes directly from the laptop charger..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2849</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No green light / no orange light
threads.message:
Good magsafe board and charger 85W guenine know

<SIGNAL>PPDCIN_G3H</SIGNAL> 16.8V

<SIGNAL>PP3V42_G3H</SIGNAL> 0V (resistance line to GND 284 ohms)

<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> 0.710V

Already checked 17/18 27/28 of <CHIP>U7000</CHIP>

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2849</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No green light / no orange light
threads.message: You already gave the answer and that is a short/low resistance to GND on 3V42. Could be anything on that rail and 284 Ohm is not enough to heat something up.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2849</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No green light / no orange light
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2849</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No green light / no orange light
threads.message:
find burned pcb under J3500

may be cut pcb

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2849</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No green light / no orange light
threads.message: Probably trash if there is a hole burned in the board. But you can dig it out and pray....
